timeline.message: Use scriptless fields rather than ad-hoc painless load-from-source scripts

timeline.bodyText: this seems wrong but it's irrelevant because the tests that use it are disabled. I plan on replacing the dynamic template with dynamic:runtime
timeline.author: javanna

timeline.bodyText: This is a tricksy bit - it's breaking one test, search/30_limits/Regexp length limit, I think because it's looking for the source value of name.keyword which of course doesn't exist.
timeline.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText:
Field names doesn't seem to be the problem.
was "{root_cause=[{type=too_long_frame_exception, reason=An HTTP line is larger than 4096 bytes.}], type=too_long_frame_exception, reason=An HTTP line is larger than 4096 bytes.}"
replies.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: you can get that exception if you make a stack overflow.
replies.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: Generating the error for the stack overflow blows out something else.
replies.author: nik9000
